text: The Three Million Trial () is a 1926 Soviet silent comedy movie directed by Yakov Protazanov.В день российского кино в Москве пройдет 20-часовой бесплатный киномарафонПРОЦЕСС О ТРЕХ МИЛЛИОНАХ It stars Igor Ilyinsky, Anatoly Ktorov, and Mikhail Klimov. ==Actors== * Igor Ilyinsky – Tapioka * Anatoly Ktorov – Cascarilla * Mikhail Klimov – Ornano, the Banker * Olga Zhizneva – Noris, the Banker's wife * Nikolai Prozorovsky – Guido * Vladimir Fogel – Man with binoculars == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1926 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov
title: The Three Million Trial
